name: AB Solutions
description:
We offer:
Basic services - Software development, testing and maintenance of applications using CMMI process methodologies and agile practices of development.
Integrated solutions - Design and development of specific IT solutions, covering the entire process from defining of business requirement, planning, architecture, design, development to maintenance and support.
Consulting - Technical consulting, IT architecture design and simplification, improvement of processes and innovations, research and prototyping.
Our cooperation models are:
Time and Material - We charge our clients for the time actually spent by our specialists involved in the project.
Fixed-Price - You can discuss the scope of the work with us, clarify all the details, discuss the deadlines and define a fixed-price project budget.
Dedicated Team - We can put together a dedicated team consisting of expert management personnel, experienced IT architects and developers, and a full-service quality assurance team to work exclusively for you.
